content.description: You will hear an excerpt. Before listening to the excerpt for the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: Beginning with the first vocal phrase, which of the following best represents the structure of each phrase?

choices.label: three plus one measures in six-eight meter
four plus one measures in six-eight meter
two plus two measures in four-four meter
four plus two measures in four-four meter

content.answer: four plus one measures in six-eight meter

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in performed music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
